ad_group.id.description: The ID of the ad group to which the bidding strategy belongs.

bidding_strategy.aligned_campaign_budget.description: The ID of the campaign budget aligned with the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.campaign_count.description: The count of campaigns using this bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.currency_code.description: The currency code used for the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.effective_currency_code.description: The effective currency code for the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.enhanced_cpc.description: Flag indicating if Enhanced CPC is enabled for the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.id.description: The ID of the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.maximize_conversion_val.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for maximize conversion value strategy.
The minimum CPC bid floor in micros for maximize conversion value strategy.
The target return on ad spend for maximize conversion value strategy.

bidding_strategy.maximize_conversions.cp.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for maximize conversions strategy.
The minimum CPC bid floor in micros for maximize conversions strategy.

bidding_strategy.maximize_conversions.ta.description: The target cost per acquisition in micros for maximize conversions strategy.

bidding_strategy.name.description: The name of the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.non_removed_campaign_co.description: The count of non-removed campaigns using this bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.resource_name.description: The resource name of the bidding strategy.

bidding_strategy.status.description: The status of the bidding strategy (e.g., enabled or paused).

bidding_strategy.target_cpa.cpc_bid_ceil.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for target CPA strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_cpa.cpc_bid_floo.description: The minimum CPC bid floor in micros for target CPA strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_cpa.target_cpa_m.description: The target cost per acquisition in micros for target CPA strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_impression_share.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for target impression share strategy.
The targeted location for the impression share strategy.
The targeted impression share fraction in micros.

bidding_strategy.target_roas.cpc_bid_cei.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for target ROAS strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_roas.cpc_bid_flo.description: The minimum CPC bid floor in micros for target ROAS strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_roas.target_roas.description: The target return on ad spend for target ROAS strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_spend.cpc_bid_ce.description: The maximum CPC bid ceiling in micros for target spend strategy.

bidding_strategy.target_spend.target_spe.description: The target spend in micros for target spend strategy.

bidding_strategy.type.description: The type of bidding strategy (e.g., target CPA, target ROAS).

segments.date.description: The date for which the data is segmented.
